name: Ingresos a Facturas de Crédito
query:
SELECT c.name AS "Pago:Link/Payment Entry:250", c.paid_amount as "Monto:Currency:150", a.name AS "Folio Afectado:Link/Sales Invoice:250", a.outstanding_amount AS "Por Cobrar:Currency:150"
from `tabSales Invoice` a LEFT JOIN 
	  `tabPayment Entry Reference` b ON a.name = b.reference_name LEFT join
	  `tabPayment Entry` c ON b.parent = c.name
WHERE str_to_date(concat(DATE_FORMAT(c.posting_date, '%%Y-%%m'), '-01'), '%%Y-%%m-%%d') = str_to_date(concat(date_format(date_add(now(), INTERVAL -1 month), '%%Y-%%m'), '-01'), '%%Y-%%m-%%d')
AND a.metodo_pago = 'PPD' 
AND c.docstatus = 1
